name: 123 Notetaker AI Free
summary_and_recommendation: Assessment based on Microsoft 365 App Certification documentation. Tool lacks enterprise-grade security controls and compliance certifications despite handling sensitive meeting data.

geographic.note: Data stored in USA with contractual documentation, which is a known secure region but external to organization control.

encryption.note: Basic encryption mentioned (TLS 1.1+ support confirmed) but no detailed encryption specifications published regarding at-rest encryption or key management.

retention.note: Clear limited retention documented as 'less than 30 days' after account termination with established data retention and disposal process.

training.note: No indication that customer data is used for AI model training based on available documentation.

sharing.note: Documentation explicitly states 'No' for transferring customer data to third parties or subprocessors.

admin.note: No enterprise admin controls documented. App integration is not with Microsoft Identity Platform, indicating individual account management only.

audit.note: No audit capabilities mentioned in documentation. No activity logs or user tracking capabilities documented for administrators.

integration.note: No enterprise integration capabilities. Documentation confirms no Microsoft Identity Platform integration and no SSO support.

violations.note: No major compliance certifications. Documentation explicitly states 'No' for SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, FedRAMP, and other major enterprise compliance standards.

transparency.note: Basic transparency with some data processing details provided but lacks comprehensive data flow diagrams and detailed third-party processor documentation.

score.note: Limited security documentation and no published security whitepapers or transparency reports.

details.dataStorage: Geographic: Data stored in USA with contractual documentation, secure region but external control | Encryption: Basic TLS 1.1+ confirmed but limited at-rest encryption details | Retention: Clear 30-day deletion policy with established disposal process
details.trainingUsage: Training: No customer data used for AI model training | Sharing: Explicitly states no third-party data sharing or subprocessors
details.accessControls: Admin: No enterprise admin controls, individual accounts only | Audit: No audit logs or user tracking for administrators | Integration: No SSO or enterprise identity integration
details.complianceRisk: Violations: No SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, or other major enterprise certifications | Transparency: Basic data processing transparency but lacks detailed flow diagrams
details.vendorTransparency: Limited security whitepapers or transparency reports

recommendations.title: Block enterprise deployment
recommendations.description: Prevent installation of 123 Notetaker AI at the tenant level due to lack of enterprise security controls and compliance certifications

recommendations.title: Evaluate enterprise alternatives
recommendations.description: Consider Microsoft native solutions or enterprise-grade meeting transcription tools with proper compliance certifications

recommendations.title: User education
recommendations.description: Educate users about risks of using unauthorized meeting recording tools that may capture sensitive information

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Assessment based on Microsoft 365 App Certification documentation. Tool lacks enterprise-grade security controls and compliance certifications despite handling sensitive meeting data.

geographic_control.justification: Data stored in USA with contractual documentation, which is a known secure region but external to organization control.

encryption_standards.justification: Basic encryption mentioned (TLS 1.1+ support confirmed) but no detailed encryption specifications published regarding at-rest encryption or key management.

data_retention.justification: Clear limited retention documented as 'less than 30 days' after account termination with established data retention and disposal process.

model_training.justification: No indication that customer data is used for AI model training based on available documentation.

data_sharing.justification: Documentation explicitly states 'No' for transferring customer data to third parties or subprocessors.

admin_management.justification: No enterprise admin controls documented. App integration is not with Microsoft Identity Platform, indicating individual account management only.

audit_capabilities.justification: No audit capabilities mentioned in documentation. No activity logs or user tracking capabilities documented for administrators.

integration.justification: No enterprise integration capabilities. Documentation confirms no Microsoft Identity Platform integration and no SSO support.

regulatory_violations.justification: No major compliance certifications. Documentation explicitly states 'No' for SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, FedRAMP, and other major enterprise compliance standards.
